resources.string:
TECHNOVATION:

The Techno-Cultural fest of the department of CSEA, IGIT, Sarang is back again with a bang, to provide a platform to the young ubiquotous talents to give their talents a new direction, and showcase their innovative and competitive skills.

ABOUT CSEA DEPARTMENT:

Recognized by the Computer Society Of India,due to its advanced technical laboratories, cyber club, diversity of courses offered, numerous achievements,and recruitment policy,it is one of the bst departments of IGIT emerged over the years.

ABOUT IGIT:

IGIT was established directly by the Govt. of Odisha in the name of OCE (Odisha College Of Engineering). Prior to this, under the name of MPT(Modem Polytechnic), it offered courses in Diploma. Later, MPT were merged and the management was transferred to an autonomous society.
